alert.note: Alert for Barnes (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 10:19AM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Major severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Dakota... Sheyenne River at Valley City affecting Barnes County. .Heavy rainfall has caused significant river rises along the Sheyenne River. Additional rainfall today may cause forecasts to rise further. Stay tuned for further updates. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sheyenne River at Valley City. * WHEN...From this morning until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Actions are taken to protect electrical distribution equipment. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 14.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this morning and continue rising to a crest of 18.5 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
